text: Summer of 1116. House of the canon Fulbert, in Paris. Pierre Abélard is approaching Helose. He tries to kiss her, but she holds him back saying, "Do not be hesitant. I am only the image you carry in your heart. Abelard Replica: —I shall be the image Helose has of me in his heart. Give it a try, then. And the images were laid out on the carpet and gathered together. FIN
title: Sententia Nominum
author: Enrique Anderson Imbert
